job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Sr Software Engineer to join our Cyber Defense team focusing on the development of the next generation AI-powered security platform. This platform will be instrumental in enhancing our cyber defense capabilities across security operations, incident response, threat intelligence, and more. The security landscape is constantly evolving, and with the adoption of ML/GenAI backed by extensive heterogeneous data, security threats are inevitably broadened. With your deep and comprehensive expertise across major technology stacks, you will architect, implement and scale industry-leading security solutions for cyber defense. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies, collaborate with cross-functional security and engineering teams, and play a key role in shaping our cybersecurity strategy.

   What you will do

     * Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance platform and services for Uber's cyber defense
     * Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven
     * Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
     * Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions
     * Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement, and mentor junior security engineers
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer - Cyber Defense

We are seeking a talented and experienced Sr Software Engineer to join our Cyber Defense team focusing on the development of the next generation AI-powered security platform. This platform will be instrumental in enhancing our cyber defense capabilities across security operations, incident response, threat intelligence, and more. The security landscape is constantly evolving, and with the adoption of ML/GenAI backed by extensive heterogeneous data, security threats are inevitably broadened. With your deep and comprehensive expertise across major technology stacks, you will architect, implement and scale industry-leading security solutions for cyber defense. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies, collaborate with cross-functional security and engineering teams, and play a key role in shaping our cybersecurity strategy.

   What you will do

     * Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance platform and services for Uber's cyber defense
     * Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven
     * Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
     * Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions
     * Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement, and mentor junior security engineers

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on applying AI/ML to cyber defense and mentions 'AI-powered security platform' and 'ML/GenAI', but the core responsibilities and technologies described lean heavily towards traditional software engineering and security solutions rather than the development or fine-tuning of AI models themselves. The role emphasizes building and scaling security platforms and services, leveraging AI models as a component, but not developing or deeply understanding the AI models' inner workings. The primary focus is on the application of AI within a security context, not on AI development itself, which aligns with the 'Ambiguous' profile's criteria for roles primarily focused on the use of AI tools to enhance productivity or traditional engineering roles.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance platform and services' directly relates to building and maintaining software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance platform and services

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions' indicates understanding business needs (cybersecurity) and translating them into technical requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions' involves the integration and development of software solutions within a broader engineering context.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement' are standard software development practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven' suggests the application and integration of AI models, though not necessarily their development from scratch.
job_tasks.phrase: Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven

architect, implement and scale industry-leading security solutions
